inputParameter.description: HV min voltage to start ramp (V)
inputParameter.name: hv_min_volt

inputParameter.description: HV max voltage to end ramp (V)
inputParameter.name: hv_max_volt

outputParameter.description: Requested HV level with the greatest error (mV)
outputParameter.name: hv_worst_set_mvolt

outputParameter.description: Read HV level with the greatest error (mV)
outputParameter.name: hv_worst_read_mvolt
